function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in comfort level may lead to higher occupancy and greater spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Higher risk of contagious diseases spread due to increased occupancy and contact.","Mitigation":"Implement measures to control and monitor occupancy levels, and improve ventilation and air quality.","Technologies":"Occupancy tracking systems, air quality sensors, and ventilation control systems.","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, public health authorities.","Owner":"Facility managers, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Introduction of demand-based control and automated functions may lead to an increase in aerosol transmission of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Higher risk of aerosol transmission due to automation and reduced manual control.","Mitigation":"Implement air filtration systems, UV sterilization, and regular cleaning and maintenance of automated systems.","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, UV sterilization units, automated cleaning and maintenance devices.","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, maintenance personnel.","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners."},{"Description":"Improved information to occupants may lead to increased social interaction and closer proximity, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission due to increased social interaction and proximity.","Mitigation":"Provide clear guidelines for safe interaction, promote remote communication, and enhance public health education.","Technologies":"Digital signage for communication, remote communication platforms, and health education resources.","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, public health educators.","Owner":"Facility managers, public health authorities."}]}
